uk.ac.cam.cl.intelligentgamedesigner.simulatedplayers

Class BoardDifficultyGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.cam.cl.intelligentgamedesigner.simulatedplayers.BoardDifficultyGenerator

  • public class BoardDifficultyGenerator
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that contains auxiliary functions for estimating certain difficulty aspects of the board.

      • getCombinableCandies

        public static int getCombinableCandies(Cell[][] cellBoard)
        Function that returns the number of combinable candies on the cellBoard.
        Parameters:
        cellBoard - The board on which the check will be performed.
        Returns:
        The number of combinable pairs on the board.

      • getSpecialCandiesScore

        public static double getSpecialCandiesScore(Cell[][] cellBoard,
                                            double colourBombScore,
                                            double specialCandyScore)
        Get the potential based on the special candies on a board. Notice that this does not include the potential of combinable special candies.
        Parameters:
        cellBoard - The board that will be evaluated.
        colourBombScore - The score for each colour bomb.
        specialCandyScore - The score for each special candy.
        Returns:
        The special candies potential of the board.

      • countHopeful

        public static int countHopeful(Cell[][] cellBoard)
        Count the hopeful candies in the board, i.e. the candies that are empty and will be replaced in the next round.
        Parameters:
        cellBoard - The board that will be examined.
        Returns:
        The number of hopedul candies.

      • getCellDifficulty

        public static double getCellDifficulty(Design levelDesign,
                                       int x,
                                       int y,
                                       int numRounds)
        Function that returns the average number of moves needed to remove a candy from the specified position (x, y) given the design.
        Parameters:
        levelDesign - The design of the level.
        x - The x-coordinate of the cell.
        y - The y-coordinate of the cell.
        numRounds - The number of rounds for which to run the simulator.
        Returns:
        The average number of moves to complete it.

      • getBoardDifficulty

        public static double[][] getBoardDifficulty(Design design,
                                            int numberOfRoundsToExecute)
        Function that returns the number of average moves to clear every cell of the board.
        Parameters:
        design - The design for the level to be checked.
        Returns:
        The difficulty array for every cell.

                                   int x,
                                   int y)
        Function that checks whether the cell can be removed on the next round.
        Parameters:
        board - The board the cell is on.
        x - The x-coordinate of the cell.
        y - The y-coordinate of the cell.
        Returns:
        whether there will be a move to remove the cell on the next round.

      • isFillable

        public static boolean isFillable(Cell[][] board,
                                 int x,
                                 int y)
        Function that determines whether the cell on the board will be filled in the next round.
        Parameters:
        board - The board that the cell is on.
        x - The x-coordinate of the cell.
        y - The y-coordinate of the cell.
        Returns:
        whether the cell will be filled in the next round.

      • isHopeful

        public static boolean isHopeful(Cell[][] board,
                                int x,
                                int y)
        Function that checks whether a cell will be filled in the next round.
        Parameters:
        board - The board where the cell is.
        x - The x coordinate of the cell.
        y - The y coordinate of the cell.
        Returns:
        Whether the cell is going to be filled in the next round.

      • toInt

        public static int toInt(boolean b)
        Simple function that converts boolean to int. true -> 1 and false -> 0
        Parameters:
        b - The boolean to be converted.
        Returns:
        The corresponding int.

      • getProbabilityOfHopefulCells

        public static double getProbabilityOfHopefulCells(Cell[][] board,
                                                  int x,
                                                  int y,
                                                  int differentColors)
        Get the probability that the unfilled cells around the position (x, y) will generate a match that will include the cell at (x, y). It needs the number of possible different candy colours to calculate the probability.
        Parameters:
        board - The board containing the cell.
        x - The x-coordinate of the cell.
        y - The y-coordinate of the cell.
        differentColors - The number of different colours a candy can take.
        Returns:
        The probability that the cell (x, y) will be cleared after the neighbouring cells have been filled.

      • countMovesThatAffectCell

        public static MovesAffectingCell countMovesThatAffectCell(GameState gameState,
                                                          int x,
                                                          int y)
        Function that counts the moves that affect a certain cell.
        Parameters:
        gameState - The game state that will be checked.
        x - The x-coordinate of the cell.
        y - The y-coordinate of the cell.
        Returns:
        The moves above and bellow the cell.

      • getMovesDelta

        public static double getMovesDelta(MovesAffectingCell movesAffecting)
        A move potential function that gives a score of how likely it is that the cell will change based on the moves above and the moves below it.
        Parameters:
        movesAffecting - The moves above and below the cell.
        Returns:
        The score based on these moves.

      • getMotionPotential

        public static double getMotionPotential(Cell[][] board,
                                        int x,
                                        int y)
        Function that returns estimate between 0 and 3.0 of how possible it is for the cell at position (x, y) to be cleared based on the special candies near it and the candies to be filled.
        Parameters:
        board - The board where the cell is.
        x - The x-coordinate of the cell.
        y - The y-coordinate of the cell.
        Returns:
        the potential that this cell will be moved.

      • getCell

        public static Cell getCell(Cell[][] board,
                           int x,
                           int y)
        Function that gets the cell at (x, y) from the given board and returns null if the coordinates are out of bounds.
        Parameters:
        board - The board on which the cell is on.
        x - The x-coordinate for the cell.
        y - The y-coordinate for the cell.
        Returns:
        the cell at that location or null if there is not such.
